io.spine.server.bus

Class Bus.AbstractBuilder<E extends io.spine.core.MessageEnvelope<?,T,?>,T extends com.google.protobuf.Message,B extends Bus.AbstractBuilder<E,T,B>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.spine.server.bus.Bus.AbstractBuilder<E,T,B>
  • Type Parameters:
    E - the type of MessageEnvelope posted by the bus
    T - the type of Message posted by the bus
    B - the own type of the builder
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CommandBus.Builder, EventBus.Builder, IntegrationBus.Builder, RejectionBus.Builder
    Enclosing class:
    Bus<T extends com.google.protobuf.Message,E extends io.spine.core.MessageEnvelope<?,T,?>,C extends io.spine.type.MessageClass,D extends MessageDispatcher<C,E,?>>

    public abstract static class Bus.AbstractBuilder<E extends io.spine.core.MessageEnvelope<?,T,?>,T extends com.google.protobuf.Message,B extends Bus.AbstractBuilder<E,T,B>>
extends java.lang.Object
    The implementation base for the bus builders.

      Creates a new instance of the bus builder.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AbstractBuilder

        protected AbstractBuilder()
        Creates a new instance of the bus builder.

    • Method Detail

      • appendFilter

        public final B appendFilter(BusFilter<E> filter)
        Adds the given filter to the builder.

        The order of appending the filters to the builder is the order of the filters in the resulting bus.

        Parameters:
        filter - the filter to append

      • removeFilter

        public final B removeFilter(BusFilter<E> filter)
        Removes the specified filter from the filter queue.

        If the filter is not present in the queue, no action is performed.

        Parameters:
        filter - the filter to delete

      • getFilters

        public final java.util.Deque<BusFilter<E>> getFilters()
        Obtains the bus filters of this builder.
        See Also:
        Bus.AbstractBuilder.appendFilter(BusFilter)

      • build

        public abstract Bus<?,E,?,?> build()
        Creates new instance of Bus with the set parameters.

        It is recommended to specify the exact resulting type of the bus in the return type when overriding this method.

      • self

        protected abstract B self()
        Returns:
        this reference to avoid redundant casts
